product_name: SmartWool PhD Long Run Shorts - Men's
long_description: The SmartWool PhD Long Run shorts power your workout with the smooth feel of merino wool in the liners. Outer shorts offer lightweight breathability and look like a standard pair of shorts-but wait!-below the all-too-normal surface lies a pair of merino-blend liners. Just as comfortable as wool base layers except lighter, the seamless liners wick moisture, breathe well, and resist odors thanks to the natural properties of merino wool. Ventilation panels in high heat zones keep things cool. Rear zippered pocket stores extras. The semifitted SmartWool PhD run shorts feature a mid rise and reflective highlights.
short_description: The SmartWool PhD Long Run shorts power your workout with the smooth feel of merino wool in the liners.
